questions.text: Disability - Has the individual self-declared a current disability as defined in the Equality Act 2010?
questions.name: disability-declared

questions.text: Is the individual doing any form of paid employment?
questions.name: paid-employment

questions.text: Has the individual previously been on the Work and Health Programme?
questions.name: previous-whp

questions.text: Does the individual have a basic skills need that can be met from other sources?
questions.name: basic-need

questions.text: Do you consider that the individual will realistically find employment in the next twelve months?
questions.name: find-work-in-12-months

questions.text: Do you consider that the individual has a realistic job goal?
questions.name: realistic-job-goal

questions.text: Is there any other provision which would be more suited for the individual's needs and help them find work?
questions.name: other-provision
